organization: Ministry of Fisheries, Animal Husbandry & Dairying
title: Image based breed recognition for cattle and buffaloes of India
description: Background -The Government of India is implementing the Bharat Pashudhan App (BPA) for systematic data recording of breeding, health, and nutrition of dairy animals. Field Level Workers (FLWs) are responsible for capturing animal data on the ground. However, despite multiple training programs, a recurring issue is the incorrect identification and registration of animal breeds of cattle and buffaloes. This misclassification significantly affects the integrity and usability of the data for research, policy planning, and targeted interventions Description- Breed identification errors in BPA often arise due to manual judgment and lack of breed-specific awareness among FLWs. India, being home to a diverse array of indigenous and crossbred cattle and buffalo breeds, presents a complex challenge for accurate breed identification. Incorrect entries compromise the value of collected data and, in turn, impact the effectiveness of genetic improvement, nutrition planning, disease control, and overall program outcomes. To address this, an AI-driven solution that can identify the breed of an animal using its image can prove extremely valuable. By using image recognition and machine learning techniques, the software can standardize breed identification and minimize manual errors. If successfully developed and validated, such a system can be integrated with the BPA to act as a decision-support tool for FLWs during registration Expected Solution-• Uses Artificial Intelligence (AI) and image analysis to recognize and classify the breed of cattle and buffaloes based on images.• Can handle diverse environmental backgrounds,lighting conditions, and varying animal poses.• Maintains a breed database (for the most common Indian cattle and buffalo breeds and their crosses).• Provides breed suggestions or confirmations at the time of registration in BPA.• Can be seamlessly integrated with the BPA platform to support real-time validation or correction of breed entries.• Includes a user-friendly interface for FLWs with minimal technical training requirements.
explanation: This problem focuses on helping field workers correctly identify cattle and buffalo breeds in India. Currently, breed identification is done manually, which often leads to mistakes because of limited knowledge and judgment. These errors reduce the quality of data in the Bharat Pashudhan App, which is important for animal health, breeding, nutrition, and government planning. To solve this, an AI-based image recognition system can be used. By analyzing animal photos, the system can suggest or confirm the correct breed, even in different environments or lighting. This tool will reduce errors, improve data reliability, and make breed registration easier.

organization: Ministry of Fisheries, Animal Husbandry & Dairying
title: Image based Animal Type Classification for cattle and buffaloes
description: Background: In dairy farming, evaluating the body structure of animals is vital to predict their longevity, productivity, and reproductive efficiency. Traditionally, Animal Type Classification (ATC)—which involves scoring animals for physical traits—is conducted by trained personnel through visual inspection and manual measurement of specific body parts. However, this manual method is prone to human error and subjectivity, even with trained professionals, resulting in inconsistent and potentially unreliable data. With advances in Artificial Intelligence (AI) and image processing technologies, there is an opportunity to automate this process. Automated scoring based on images can ensure standardization, minimize observer bias, and improve the reliability of data captured for scientific and breeding purposes.Description: The Government of India is implementing the Rashtriya Gokul Mission (RGM) since December 2014, aiming to conserve and develop indigenous bovine breeds, genetically upgrade the bovine population, and enhance milk productivity. Under this mission, Progeny Testing (PT) and Pedigree Selection (PS) programs are being carried out in key dairy breeds across the country to produce high genetic merit bulls for breeding purposes.Animal Type Classification (ATC) is a crucial step in identifying top-performing elite dams, which are potential mothers of future breeding bulls. Currently, ATC is performed manually by a trained Animal Typer who visually examines and measures physical traits, and then records the scores in the Bharat Pashudhan App (BPA). Despite training, errors due to fatigue, bias, or measurement inaccuracies can adversely affect data quality and scientific analysis.There is a need for an AI-driven solution that can automate this classification process by analyzing animal images, extracting body structure parameters, and assigning standardized scores with minimal human intervention. If integrated with BPA, such a solution would enhance the accuracy, efficiency, and scientific validity of animal evaluation under PT and PS programs.Expected Solution: Students are expected to develop an AI-based Auto Recording of Animal Type Classification System that can:Use images of cattle and buffaloes to evaluate physical traits relevant to Animal Type Classification.Extract and quantify specific body structure parameters (e.g., body length, height at withers, chest width, rump angle, etc.) using AI and image processing techniques.Generate objective and consistent classification scores.Auto-record and store the classification data in a structured format.Provide seamless integration with BPA to auto-save the classification records at the time of evaluation.Be user-friendly and operable by field personnel with minimal technical skills.
explanation: This problem focuses on automating Animal Type Classification (ATC) for cattle and buffaloes. Currently, ATC is done manually by trained professionals who visually inspect and measure physical traits of animals. However, this method is prone to human error, bias, and inconsistencies, which can reduce data accuracy. Since ATC plays a key role in selecting top-performing animals for breeding under the Rashtriya Gokul Mission, reliable evaluation is very important. An AI-based solution can use images to automatically analyze body structure traits, generate consistent scores, and directly record data in the Bharat Pashudhan App. This will improve accuracy, save time, and standardize evaluations.

title: Disaster Preparedness and Response Education System for Schools and Colleges
description: Impact / Why this problem needs to be solved Lack of awareness and preparedness leads to panic, chaos, and potentially fatal outcomes during emergencies. By integrating disaster education into regular learning, institutions can equip students and staff with life-saving knowledge and skills. This is especially critical in areas prone to natural calamities.Empowering young people with this knowledge not only makes campuses safer but also contributes to a more disaster-resilient society.Expected Outcomes• A digital platform or app that offers interactive disaster education modules, region-specific alerts, and virtual drills.• Gamified learning experiences to improve engagement.• Emergency contact directories and real-time communication tools during disasters.• Dashboards for school administrators to track preparedness scores and drill participation.Relevant Stakeholders / Beneficiaries• Students (K-12 and higher education)• Teachers and administrative staff• Educational institutions and local disaster response teams• Parents and guardians• Government departments (NDMA, Education Ministry) Supporting Data• NDMA reports show low awareness levels in schools despite India’s high disaster vulnerability index.• UNDRR has recommended integrating disaster risk reduction in education policies (Ref: National Disaster Management Authority).
explanation: This problem addresses the lack of disaster preparedness in schools and colleges across India. Although emergency guidelines exist, most institutions do not have proper training systems or digital tools to teach students how to respond to disasters like earthquakes, floods, or fires. Manual drills are rare and often ineffective, leaving students unprepared and vulnerable. The solution is to build a digital education platform that provides interactive modules, gamified learning, region-specific disaster awareness, and virtual drills. It can also include emergency contacts, real-time communication, and dashboards for administrators. This will make campuses safer, reduce panic, and build a disaster-resilient society.

title: Gamified Environmental Education Platform for Schools and Colleges
description: Problem DescriptionDespite the rising urgency of climate change and environmental degradation, environmental education remains largely theoretical in many Indian schools and colleges. Students are often taught textbook-based content with little emphasis on real-world application, local ecological issues, or personal responsibility.There is a lack of engaging tools that motivate students to adopt eco-friendly practices or understand the direct consequences of their lifestyle choices. Traditional methods fail to instill sustainable habits or inspire youth participation in local environmental efforts.Impact As future decision-makers, students must be environmentally literate and   empowered to take meaningful actions. Without innovative education methods, we risk raising a generation unaware of sustainability challenges.An interactive, practical approach to environmental learning will foster long-term behavioral change, local involvement, and a ripple effect across families and communities. This aligns with India's SDG goals and NEP 2020's emphasis on experiential learning.Expected Outcomes• A gamified mobile/web platform or app that teaches students about environmental issues through interactive lessons, challenges, quizzes, and real-world tasks (e.g., tree-planting, waste segregation).• Tracking of eco-points, enabling school-level competitions.• Rewards for sustainable practices through digital badges and recognition.Relevant Stakeholders / Beneficiaries• School and college students• Teachers and eco-club coordinators• Environmental NGOs and government departments Supporting Data • UNESCO reports that experiential, gamified learning increases student retention and engagement by over 70%.• NEP 2020 encourages integration of environmental awareness into the curriculum.
explanation: This problem highlights the gap in environmental education in schools and colleges, where learning is mostly theory-based with little focus on practical action. Students often lack awareness of local ecological issues and are not motivated to adopt sustainable habits. To address this, a gamified education platform can make learning fun and impactful. Through interactive lessons, quizzes, challenges, and real-world eco-tasks like tree-planting or waste segregation, students can earn points, rewards, and compete at school levels. This approach will encourage active participation, long-term behavior change, and community involvement, helping create environmentally responsible citizens aligned with SDG and NEP 2020 goals.

title: Smart Crop Advisory System for Small and Marginal Farmers
description: Problem Description A majority of small and marginal farmers in India rely on traditional knowledge, local shopkeepers, or guesswork for crop selection, pest control, and fertilizer use. They lack access to personalized, real-time advisory services that account for soil type, weather conditions, and crop history.This often leads to poor yield, excessive input costs, and environmental degradation due to overuse of chemicals. Language barriers, low digital literacy, and absence of localized tools further limit their access to modern agri-tech resources.Impact / Why this problem needs to be solved Helping small farmers make informed decisions can significantly increase productivity, reduce costs, and improve livelihoods. It also contributes to sustainable farming practices, food security, and environmental conservation. A smart advisory solution can empower farmers with scientific insights in their native language and reduce dependency on unreliable third-party advice.Expected Outcomes• A multilingual, AI-based mobile app or chatbot that provides real-time, location-specific crop advisory.• Soil health recommendations and fertilizer guidance.• Weather-based alerts and predictive insights.• Pest/disease detection via image uploads.• Market price tracking.• Voice support for low-literate users.• Feedback and usage data collection for continuous improvement.Relevant Stakeholders / Beneficiaries• Small and marginal farmers• Agricultural extension officers• Government agriculture departments• NGOs and cooperatives• Agri-tech startupsSupporting Data• 86% of Indian farmers are small or marginal (NABARD Report, 2022).• Studies show ICT-based advisories can increase crop yield by 20–30%.
explanation: This problem focuses on helping small and marginal farmers, who often lack access to proper agricultural guidance. Many farmers depend on traditional practices or word-of-mouth advice, which may not suit changing weather, soil conditions, or crop diseases. This leads to low productivity and financial loss. A Smart Crop Advisory System can solve this by using AI, weather data, and soil information to give farmers personalized advice on crop selection, sowing time, irrigation, fertilizers, and pest control. Delivered through a simple mobile app or SMS, it can guide farmers with real-time, location-specific recommendations, improving yield, income, and sustainability.

title: Smart Curriculum Activity & Attendance App
description: Problem Description Many educational institutions still depend on manual attendance systems, which are time-consuming and error-prone. Teachers spend a significant portion of class time marking attendance, reducing valuable instructional hours. Additionally, students often waste free periods with unproductive activities due to a lack of structured guidance. This leads to poor time management and reduced alignment with long-term academic or career goals. There is also a gap in personalized learning support during idle classroom hours. Institutions currently lack tools that integrate daily schedules with individual student planning and automated tracking.Impact / Why this problem needs to be solved This issue impacts both administrative efficiency and student development. Automating attendance saves teachers' time and ensures more accurate records. Additionally, providing students with structured personal development activities during free time helps improve productivity, goal clarity, and learning outcomes. Institutions can also gain better insight into student behavior and engagement, allowing for more targeted support.Expected Outcomes • Automatically marks student attendance based on the daily timetable using QR code, Bluetooth/Wi-Fi proximity, or face recognition.• Displays real-time attendance on a classroom screen.• Suggests personalized academic tasks during free periods based on the student's interests, strengths, and career goals.• Generates a daily routine combining class schedule, free time, and long-term personal goals.The app will require minimal infrastructure and be usable by both students and staff with basic training.Relevant Stakeholders / Beneficiaries• Students• Teachers• College administrators• Career counselors• Education departments Supporting Data• Surveys and reports on classroom time usage, student productivity, and NEP 2020 recommendations emphasizing personalized and experiential learning.
explanation: This project aims to create a smart app for schools that manages both student curriculum activities and attendance in one place. Currently, attendance and activity tracking are done manually, which often leads to errors and wasted time. With this app, teachers can easily mark attendance, assign activities, and monitor student progress digitally. Students and parents can also view records in real-time. It will reduce paperwork, improve accuracy, and provide instant insights for teachers and administrators. The app will also help schools modernize their management system, making education more organized, transparent, and effective for everyone.

title: Automated Attendance System for Rural Schools
description: Detailed description about the automated attendance system.
explanation: This project focuses on solving the problem of manual attendance in rural schools. Teachers often spend valuable class time taking attendance, and records can be inaccurate or lost. An automated system will use technology such as face recognition or ID-based scanning to mark attendance quickly and reliably. The system will store attendance data digitally, making it easy for teachers, parents, and administrators to access. It will reduce errors, save time, and ensure transparency. By automating this process, rural schools can improve efficiency, ensure better monitoring of students, and allow teachers to focus more on teaching rather than paperwork.

title: Real-Time Public Transport Tracking for Small Cities
description: Detailed description about the public transport tracking system.
explanation: This project is about building a system that tracks buses and other public transport in small cities in real-time. Currently, people often face uncertainty about bus timings and routes, which leads to waiting, delays, and inconvenience. With a GPS-based tracking system, passengers can view live locations of buses through a mobile app or display boards at stops. This will save time, improve trust in public transport, and encourage more people to use it. For transport authorities, it will help monitor operations and manage fleets better. The system will make travel more efficient, reliable, and user-friendly for small cities.

title: Automated Student Attendance Monitoring and Analytics System for Colleges
description: Detailed description about the college attendance monitoring system.
explanation: This project introduces a digital solution for automating attendance in colleges. Instead of manual roll calls or paper registers, the system will use technology like biometrics, QR codes, or face recognition to mark attendance instantly. All records will be stored digitally and analyzed for useful insights. For example, it can show attendance trends, identify frequently absent students, and generate automated reports. Teachers and administrators can save time, while students and parents can easily track attendance. This will improve transparency, reduce proxy attendance, and ensure better discipline. It also supports data-driven decision-making for improving academic performance and campus management.

title: Digital Platform for Centralized Alumni Data Management and Engagement
description: Detailed description about the alumni data management platform.
explanation: This project focuses on building a centralized digital platform to manage and connect alumni of educational institutions. Currently, alumni records are scattered and difficult to update, which limits opportunities for networking, mentorship, and fundraising. With this platform, institutions can maintain an updated alumni database, organize events, and share opportunities. Alumni can connect with each other, guide current students, and contribute to their alma mater. It will strengthen engagement between institutions and their graduates, creating a supportive community. The platform will also help schools and colleges track alumni achievements, improve reputation, and build stronger bonds for long-term growth.

title: Digital Learning Platform for Rural School Students in Nabha
description: Detailed description about the digital learning platform for rural students.
explanation: This project aims to create a digital learning platform for rural school students in Nabha. Many rural schools lack proper teaching resources and updated materials. A digital platform can provide quality lessons, videos, quizzes, and interactive study content to bridge this gap. Students can learn at their own pace and revise anytime, while teachers can use it to make classes more engaging. It will also support offline features for areas with poor internet connectivity. By improving access to modern education tools, the platform will empower rural students, reduce learning inequality, and help them compete with urban peers successfully.

title: Smart Classroom & Timetable Scheduler
description: Detailed description about the smart classroom and timetable scheduler.
explanation: This project is about developing a system to manage smart classrooms and schedule timetables automatically. In many schools and colleges, timetable planning is done manually, which is time-consuming and often results in clashes or inefficiency. With a digital scheduler, classes can be allocated intelligently, considering teacher availability, classroom resources, and subject requirements. The system will also support smart classrooms with features like digital notes, attendance integration, and resource sharing. Students and teachers will benefit from a more organized learning environment, while administrators save time. It will modernize academic management and make education more structured and efficient overall.

title: Al-Based Crop Recommendation for Farmers
description: Detailed description about the AI-based crop recommendation system.
explanation: This project will help farmers decide which crops to grow using artificial intelligence. Farmers often face losses when they select crops unsuitable for their soil, climate, or market demand. The AI-based system will analyze soil type, weather patterns, and local conditions to recommend the best crops for higher yield and profit. It can also provide advice on sowing time, irrigation, and fertilizer use. Farmers can access this information through a simple app or SMS in local languages. By giving scientific, data-driven guidance, this solution will reduce risks, improve productivity, and support small and marginal farmers in rural areas.

title: Crowdsourced Civic Issue Reporting and Resolution System
description: Detailed description about the civic issue reporting system.
explanation: This project is about creating a digital platform where people can report everyday civic issues like potholes, garbage collection, broken streetlights, or water leakage directly through an app. Citizens can upload photos, location details, and short descriptions of problems. These reports will be sent to the concerned government departments for quick action. The platform will also allow people to track the status of their complaint in real time. This system makes communication between citizens and authorities easier, improves accountability, and ensures cleaner, safer, and better-managed cities. It empowers people to actively participate in maintaining their community’s environment and infrastructure.

title: Development of a Smart Digital Platform to Promote Eco & Cultural Tourism in Jharkhand
description: Detailed description about the tourism platform for Jharkhand.
explanation: This project focuses on building a smart digital platform that highlights Jharkhand’s eco-tourism and cultural heritage. The app or website will showcase tourist destinations, local festivals, tribal culture, handicrafts, and eco-friendly travel options. It will provide travelers with itineraries, maps, booking options, and guidance on sustainable tourism practices. Local communities can promote their art, food, and homestays, helping them earn income. The platform may also include AR/VR-based experiences for virtual exploration of heritage sites. By encouraging responsible tourism, it will not only increase visitors but also preserve nature, support local livelihoods, and strengthen cultural pride across Jharkhand’s unique destinations.

title: Al-Based Smart Allocation Engine for PM Internship Scheme
description: Detailed description about the AI-based allocation engine for internships.
explanation: This project is about creating an AI-powered system to automatically match students with internships under the Prime Minister’s Internship Scheme. Instead of manual allocation, the system will consider factors like student skills, academic background, preferences, and location while also analyzing internship providers’ requirements. Using smart algorithms, the platform ensures fair, transparent, and efficient allocation of internships. Students will get opportunities that suit their interests and capabilities, while companies or institutions receive the most relevant candidates. This solution will save time, reduce bias, and make internship distribution smooth and scalable, benefitting both students and organizations across the country.

title: Al-Based Internship Recommendation Engine for PM Internship Scheme
description: Detailed description about the AI-based internship recommendation engine.
explanation: This project aims to create an AI-based recommendation system that helps students find the most suitable internships. The platform will analyze student profiles, including academic records, skills, career interests, and previous experiences. It will then suggest relevant internship opportunities under the Prime Minister’s Internship Scheme. Like Netflix or Amazon recommendations, this engine will use machine learning to provide personalized results. Students will save time in searching, and organizations can reach the right talent. It improves the internship process by ensuring better matches, boosting student learning outcomes, and enhancing employability for young people across different fields and educational backgrounds.

title: Al-Powered Crop Yield Prediction and Optimization
description: Detailed description about the AI-powered crop yield prediction system.
explanation: This project focuses on using artificial intelligence to help farmers predict and improve crop yields. The system will collect data from weather reports, soil conditions, satellite imagery, and past harvests. AI models will then analyze this information to forecast how much crop a farmer can expect and suggest ways to increase production. It can also recommend the best time for sowing, watering, or harvesting. With this tool, farmers can reduce risks from uncertain weather, plan their resources better, and maximize profits. It empowers small and marginal farmers with modern technology to make smarter, data-driven agricultural decisions for higher productivity.

title: Gamified Learning Platform for Rural Education
description: Detailed description about the gamified learning platform for rural education.
explanation: This project is about creating a fun, game-based digital platform to improve education in rural areas. Instead of only using textbooks, students will learn through interactive games, quizzes, and activities that make subjects more interesting. The platform will include rewards, points, and levels to keep students motivated. Teachers can also track student progress and give feedback. By making learning enjoyable, this system will help rural children improve their understanding of subjects, reduce dropouts, and encourage regular attendance. It combines education with entertainment, ensuring that even students in remote areas get equal opportunities for quality and engaging learning experiences.

title: Al-Driven Public Health Chatbot for Disease Awareness
description: Detailed description about the AI-driven public health chatbot.
explanation: This project introduces an AI-powered chatbot that can provide quick, reliable information on common diseases and health practices. Users can ask health-related questions in simple language, and the chatbot will reply with verified information on symptoms, prevention, and treatments. It will also share awareness about seasonal illnesses, vaccinations, and hygiene practices. Available in multiple languages, it will be easy to use for people across different regions. The chatbot reduces the need for visiting doctors for basic queries, helps in spreading accurate health awareness, and ensures people stay informed. It’s a cost-effective, accessible way to promote healthy communities everywhere.

title: Smart Traffic Management System for Urban Congestion
description: Detailed description about the smart traffic management system.
explanation: This project is about building a smart system to reduce traffic jams in busy cities. Using cameras, sensors, and AI, the system will monitor traffic flow in real time and adjust traffic signals automatically to ease congestion. It can suggest alternate routes to drivers through a mobile app, track accident-prone zones, and alert authorities during emergencies. Data collected will help city planners design better roads and manage peak-hour traffic. This solution will save time, reduce fuel consumption, lower pollution, and improve road safety. The smart system makes transportation more efficient and ensures smoother, faster travel in growing urban areas.

title: Enhancing Student Awareness on difference between Aadhaar linked and Direct Beneficiary Transfer (DBT) enabled Aadhaar seeded bank account.
description: Detailed description about enhancing student awareness on Aadhaar and DBT.
explanation: This project focuses on creating awareness among students about the difference between a normal Aadhaar-linked account and an Aadhaar-seeded account used for Direct Benefit Transfer (DBT). Many students face confusion about subsidies, scholarships, and government benefits due to this gap in knowledge. The initiative will use digital campaigns, mobile apps, and interactive workshops to educate students about how DBT works and why Aadhaar seeding is important. By learning this, students can ensure they receive government benefits without issues. This project empowers youth with financial knowledge and prevents delays or failures in getting essential subsidies, scholarships, and welfare benefits.

title: Real life solutions for Waste Management.
description: Detailed description about real-life solutions for waste management.
explanation: This project is about developing practical, real-world solutions to handle waste effectively. The focus is on segregation, recycling, and safe disposal of solid and liquid waste. It may include creating mobile apps to guide households on waste separation, smart bins with sensors, or recycling units in local communities. The platform can also connect people with waste collectors and recyclers. By involving schools, colleges, and communities, the system spreads awareness and encourages sustainable practices. This initiative helps reduce pollution, promotes a cleaner environment, and supports the idea of turning waste into useful resources, contributing to a healthier and greener India.

organization: Ministry of Youth Affairs and Sports
title: Al-Powered Mobile Platform for Democratizing Sports Talent Assessment
description: Detailed description about the AI-powered sports talent assessment platform.
explanation: This project proposes a mobile app that uses AI to identify and assess sports talent. Students and young athletes can upload videos of their performance, such as running, jumping, or playing a sport. The AI system will analyze movements, speed, stamina, and skills to give them a talent score. Coaches and organizations can discover hidden talent from rural and urban areas. This ensures equal opportunities for everyone, even those without access to big sports academies. By democratizing sports assessment, the platform encourages more youth participation, helps athletes improve, and supports India in finding and nurturing future champions in multiple sports.

title: Al-Powered Personal Farming Assistant for Kerala Farmers
description: Detailed description about the AI-powered farming assistant.
explanation: This project is about creating an AI-powered personal assistant for farmers in Kerala. The assistant will act like a digital guide, answering farmers’ queries about crops, soil health, irrigation, fertilizers, weather forecasts, and pest control. Farmers can use it in their local language through mobile phones, making it easy to access. The assistant will provide personalized advice based on farm size, crop type, and seasonal conditions. It empowers farmers to make smarter, data-driven decisions, leading to higher yields and reduced risks. This solution bridges the knowledge gap and ensures farmers use technology to improve productivity and increase their income.

title: Gamified Platform to Promote Sustainable Farming Practices
description: Detailed description about the gamified platform for sustainable farming.
explanation: This project aims to develop a game-like digital platform that teaches farmers sustainable farming techniques. Through interactive lessons, quizzes, and real-world challenges, farmers learn about water conservation, organic farming, soil health, and eco-friendly crop management. The platform rewards them with points, badges, or certificates when they adopt sustainable practices. Competitions between farmers or villages can be added to make learning engaging. This not only makes agriculture more fun but also encourages farmers to adopt eco-friendly methods. Over time, it helps build awareness, reduces environmental damage, and improves productivity, creating a win-win for farmers, communities, and the environment.

title: Al-Based Farmer Query Support and Advisory System
description: Detailed description about the AI-based farmer query support system.
explanation: This project focuses on creating an AI-based platform where farmers can ask questions about their farming problems and receive expert advice instantly. Farmers can input queries about pests, diseases, crop care, soil issues, or weather, and the system will provide quick, accurate solutions using AI and agricultural knowledge databases. It can be made multilingual for local farmers’ convenience. The advisory system reduces dependency on limited human experts, ensures farmers get timely help, and prevents crop losses. By supporting farmers with 24/7 query assistance, this project improves decision-making, increases productivity, and promotes modern technology in agriculture, especially for smallholders.

title: Development of a travel related software app that can be installed on mobile phones that could capture trip related information
description: Detailed description about the travel information capturing app.
explanation: This project is about building a mobile app that helps travelers record and manage all trip-related information. Users can log details like destinations, travel dates, expenses, routes, and experiences. The app can capture photos, store tickets, and create travel diaries. It may also suggest nearby attractions, restaurants, and cultural sites. With GPS tracking, it can create automatic trip maps. This makes travel planning easier and allows people to preserve their memories digitally. For tourism boards, the collected data can provide insights into travel patterns. The app improves convenience, encourages tourism, and helps users enjoy smoother, better-planned journeys.

title: Development of a Digital Mental Health and Psychological Support System for Students in Higher Education
description: Detailed description about the digital mental health support system.
explanation: This project aims to develop a digital platform that provides mental health and psychological support for students in colleges and universities. It will include features like chat-based counseling, self-assessment tests, stress management resources, and access to professional therapists online. Students can seek help confidentially without the fear of stigma. The system will use AI to recommend coping strategies for anxiety, stress, or depression. It ensures students receive timely support, preventing academic dropouts and improving overall well-being. By normalizing mental health conversations and offering 24/7 access to help, this project promotes healthier, happier, and more resilient student communities.

title: Centralised Digital Platform for Comprehensive student activity record in HEls
description: Detailed description about the centralized student activity record platform.
explanation: This project is about building a centralized digital system to record all student activities in Higher Education Institutions (HEIs). Instead of only keeping academic marks, the platform will also track extracurricular activities, internships, projects, sports achievements, and volunteer work. Students will have a single digital profile showing their all-round growth. Teachers and universities can use this record for performance evaluation, scholarships, or placements. It makes student data easy to access, transparent, and verifiable. This system supports holistic education by recognizing skills beyond academics, making students more employable and giving them a well-rounded portfolio for their future careers.

title: One-Stop Personalized Career & Education Advisor
description: Detailed description about the personalized career and education advisor.
explanation: This project is about creating a digital advisor that helps students plan their education and career paths. Using AI, the platform will analyze students’ strengths, interests, skills, and academic performance to suggest the best career options, courses, and training programs. It will also provide information on scholarships, entrance exams, and job opportunities. Students can get personalized guidance just like a career counselor, but available online 24/7. This system ensures that students, especially from rural or underprivileged areas, receive equal access to career advice. By offering customized roadmaps, it helps youth make informed choices and achieve long-term success.

title: Remote classroom for rural colleges
description: Detailed description about the remote classroom for rural colleges.
explanation: This project focuses on building a remote classroom system to provide quality education in rural colleges. Using online platforms, virtual lectures, and digital tools, students in rural areas can access the same learning resources as urban students. Teachers from anywhere can deliver live or recorded classes, and students can interact through video conferencing, quizzes, and discussions. The system reduces the lack of faculty in remote regions and ensures better learning opportunities. It bridges the education gap, supports the National Education Policy’s goals, and helps students from rural backgrounds gain knowledge, confidence, and skills needed for future careers.

title: Al-based drop-out prediction and counseling system
description: Detailed description about the AI-based drop-out prediction system.
explanation: This project is about using AI to predict which students are at risk of dropping out of school or college. The system will analyze data like attendance, grades, financial background, and engagement levels to identify struggling students. Once identified, it will alert teachers and provide counseling support to help those students. The platform may suggest mentorship programs, financial aid, or personalized study plans to keep students motivated. By intervening early, the system can reduce dropout rates, ensure continuity in education, and improve student success rates. It helps institutions support vulnerable students and promote equal access to education for all.

title: ERP-Based Integrated Student Management system Language Agnostic
description: Detailed description about the ERP-based student management system.
explanation: This project is about creating a centralized ERP-based platform to manage student-related activities in schools and colleges. The system will cover admissions, attendance, timetable scheduling, exams, results, fees, and hostel management in one place. Being language-agnostic means it will support multiple Indian languages, making it accessible across regions. Teachers, students, and parents can access data easily, improving transparency and efficiency. It reduces paperwork, saves time, and ensures smooth coordination between departments. By digitizing student management, this system makes education administration more organized and reliable, creating a seamless experience for institutions, students, and parents alike across different states.

title: Chatbot
description: Detailed description about the chatbot.
explanation: This project aims to create a chatbot for education that can answer students’ questions instantly. Whether it’s about syllabus, exams, results, or assignments, students can interact with the chatbot 24/7 on their mobile or computer. Teachers can also use it to share updates and reminders. The chatbot will use AI and natural language processing to give accurate and quick responses in simple language. It saves time for both students and teachers by automating routine queries. This solution makes communication faster, improves student support, and ensures everyone has easy access to important academic information anytime they need it.

title: Develop computer programs to identify the design principles behind the Kolam designs and recreate the kolams.
description: Detailed description about identifying and recreating Kolam designs.
explanation: This project is about developing computer programs that can study traditional Kolam designs (beautiful patterns drawn with rice flour in South India) and recreate them digitally. The system will analyze the symmetry, geometry, and artistic principles behind Kolam patterns and then generate similar designs using algorithms.
